alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 26 at 3:15AM EST until February 28 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida, Southern Oneida, Otsego, Delaware and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening or Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will move in late Monday afternoon with heavy snowfall rates during the evening and early overnight hours. Rates as high as 1 inch per hour and gusty winds with blowing snow will create hazardous travel conditions. The snow will taper off Tuesday morning before ending later in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan
